Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: You are restricting very low, and from what you've written here you're clearly having physical symptoms of malnourishment.   You can restore your body, your organs and brain, but it means eating more or being tubed. I really hope you and your therapist can work out a care plan that will keep you safe. Keep fighting, your life is so much more than this illness and you deserve to be free.
